He despaired that the title of the 
strongest would always be beyond

to rampage across the countryside,
destroying all he could see. But then,
a man appeared before him.

context.en_us:
Alchemy was forbidden to dragons.
The Blazewyrm felt disgust at the
breaking of this grotesque taboo,
and instantly attacked the twisted
creature the man had created.

雄龙感到了生理上的厌恶。
他将内心翻涌的愤懑和憎恶

He battled the dragon and won.
But there was no joy in victory,
for his opponent had been a
lowly dragon without pride or
strength of its own.
